desc: Caulicure Compression system for the treatment, management and prevention of Cauliflower Ear. Useful for Athletes in BJJ/Jiu Jitsu, Wrestlers, Boxers and Rugby Players. By using the Caulicure system instead of a thermoplastic splint, we can eliminate medical visits, anesthesia, sutures or antibiotics

layout.text: Our ORIGINAL-PATENTED compression technology prevents CAULIFLOWER EAR (ON AND OFF) the mats. The system is SIMPLE, EFFECTIVE and manufactured in the USA from the highest quality medical-grade materials.
